storyInfo: The cultists scatter before the Abyssal Hunters. A mysterious Hunter by the name of Ulpianus kidnaps Amaia, while Elysium finds a clue in the files left by the cultists.

attributes.content: You're not gonna help?
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: You aren't rising from your seat either.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'm not needed.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: Strictly speaking, I'm still a prisoner of Iberia. It is not my place to worry for a High Inquisitor.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Let's talk about the two of us.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We'll stay in this town on the coastline, for a while.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: We know how to follow stage directions. If you and your Abyssal Hunters fail, we'll take the Iberians and pull back to an appropriate position.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: Assuming the old man outside listens to us, anyway.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: ...You're willing to help the people on the land.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Frost is young, I'm about the same age as Dan, and Aya maybe a little older.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: There's little left for us to love, except... music.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: Frailty of body and mind has driven humans to seek breakthroughs within their short lifespans.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: And what do you know, they pulled it off.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: ...Indeed.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But the sea's not a fan of heavy metal.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: We don't have a choice. As far as survival is concerned, the land is the lesser evil.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: It would not be difficult to get this country to listen. Reveal a few secrets, hint at old wounds, and promise that the same disaster will not strike again.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Can it really be that easy?
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: Even simpler, if promises can be considered lies.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Monsters! Monsters!
attributes.name: Panicking Townsfolk

attributes.content: Where's the Inquisition?! Anyone?! Help!
attributes.name: Panicking Townsfolk

attributes.content: Grr... grr...
attributes.name: Sea Terror

attributes.content: Eek!
attributes.name: Panicking Townsfolk

attributes.content: As ever, Kal'tsit picks the worst meeting locations.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: What's going on here?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: T-Thank you... A-Are you an Ægir too? From the outside?
attributes.name: Panicking Townsfolk

attributes.content: Ah, you refer to AUS. Ægir, eh...
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: A-Are you here to fight them? You took out those monsters in the blink of an eye...
attributes.name: Panicking Townsfolk

attributes.content: Your attitude towards the Ægir seems different in this town.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: There used to be a lot of them around here, until about twenty years ago.
attributes.name: Panicking Townsfolk

attributes.content: Did the Inquisition send you? Sh-Should we ask for their help?
attributes.name: Panicking Townsfolk

attributes.content: None of my concern.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: But unless you intend to get hurt, I recommended hiding until this is over.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: A-Alright.
attributes.name: Panicking Townsfolk

attributes.content: This place, they're everywhere.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Not as bad as Sal Viento, but it's still strange.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: This town has not been consumed by rot. There are even those leading more or less normal lives here.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: The waves have not touched this place.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Then the flotsam has gone into hiding.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: No surprise there. If our target is that ship, then Kal'tsit must have chosen this place for a reason.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Should we split up?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I'll find Kal'tsit. You and Shark handle the Sea Terrors.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: They are weak, but don't get hurt. Weakness is often bait.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: ...Shark?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Take care of her, Skadi. I still have trouble getting used to how she is now.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Monsters?! Where did they come from?
attributes.name: Fleeing Townsfolk

attributes.content: This way!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Oh, er, right!
attributes.name: Fleeing Townsfolk

attributes.content: They're relatively few in number, but surprisingly coordinated. Is someone leading them?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: And how could they have just popped up out of nowhere? Where are they hiding?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Is it... this way?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (Getting closer... there's someone here!)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: One falls, another takes their place. We give our lives only to buy time.
attributes.name: Mournful Adherent

attributes.content: No one here can stand against a High Inquisitor. All who resist are doomed.
attributes.name: Mournful Adherent

attributes.content: In death lies hope. Do not squander it.
attributes.name: Silent Cultist

attributes.content: Yes... we must hasten our departure. But it is a shame to abandon the closest outpost we have to the Eye of Iberia...
attributes.name: Mournful Adherent

attributes.content: We need but one to reach the Eye... Who goes there?!
attributes.name: Mournful Adherent

attributes.content: (Crap!)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Liberi! Don't let him get away!
attributes.name: Mournful Adherent

attributes.content: Tch.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Gran Faro will be no more. Is this really what you want?
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: Our interests are aligned. This shouldn't have to happen.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: You're the only one who can stop the both the Inquisition and your own people.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: I'll kill you, Amaia. Soon.
attributes.name: Bizarre Hunter

attributes.content: My, my... I thought we were on a first-name basis, Ulpianus.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: Perhaps you intended to make your move once we'd arrived at the lighthouse? But you know full well that's not our destination.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: We're going someplace further, and it's there that we'll make our choice.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: Aren't the Abyssal Hunters all of one mind? Why haven't you gone back to your squad?
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: What are you thinking?
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: You never saw what I saw.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Ah, yes... the oldest story in the book. They never saw what you saw, either.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: Did you lose trust in each other?
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: Ægir is united by the bonds of blood.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: I chose to go into exile in order to achieve our common goal.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Uh huh...
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: Stay away from them, Amaia.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Even on dry land, Gladiia, Skadi and Laurentina can wipe this town from existence with little more than a shrug.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: The hand that Amaia has placed on the book moves ever so slightly.
Unperturbed, she smiles back at the provocation.
You're right. Thank you for your concern.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: I need that ship.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: I must reach it before Gladiia. They cannot return to Ægir knowing nothing of what's going on.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Finally shook them off!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: How can they be hiding this many people? Is this town some kind of clown car?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: There's nothing but barrens to the north.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: So where are they coming from?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Hm.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: A pleasure to meet you, ma'am.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: You must be the Abyssal Hunter that Kal'tsit mentioned.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Is this your work?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Iberia is not always so messy. I beg your pardon.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Gladiia is quiet for a moment.
In her long years on dry land, she has seen how weak and backwards the terrestrial states are, but also the strength of the Inquisitors at Sal Viento.
Kal'tsit's words echo in her mind as she thinks on how to live alongside those above water.
The silence lasts only a moment.
I am Gladiia, Technology Consul of Ægir, and the Abyssal Hunters' Chief Designer of Warfare.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: For the first time, she speaks to a land-dweller as a representative of Ægir.
Her counterpart nods, sheathes his rapier, and strides over the silent carcass of the Sea Terror.
Carmen, High Inquisitor of the Iberian Inquisition. I see the legends of Ægir hold true.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: You're different from the others.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I have a few more years under my belt.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Where's Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: She's speaking to another guest from the ocean in the chapel.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Gladiia turns to walk away when—
If you've come to speak to the doctor, I'm sure she's shared the same information with you.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: ...Perhaps.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: What do you think of her suggestion?
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: We can talk after I've confirmed she's unharmed.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: We have no reason to harm someone who wishes to protect Iberia from the bottom of her heart.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: So you say.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I've seen more foolishness in my brief time on land than I have for half a lifetime.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: If it's been such a brief time, how can you be so sure?
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: The worst of times brings out the worst in people. Iberia's current reality is far from gilded.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Regardless, I'm not here to debate.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: If she's in the chapel behind you, then—
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: You'll never reach the Eye of Iberia without the Inquisition's help.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: It was not destroyed in the Profound Silence. If the Stultifera remains afloat, then the Eye of Iberia is the only way to find it in the vastness of the ocean.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: What Iberia can offer, I can achieve on my own with only slightly more effort.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I suppose I have something to look forward to then, Gladiia.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: How many left?
attributes.name: Vigilant Cultist

attributes.content: Four or five, maybe. Some have departed to seek sanctuary elsewhere.
attributes.name: Agitated Cultist

attributes.content: Very well. Burn these documents. We don't have time for them.
attributes.name: Vigilant Cultist

attributes.content: Gran Faro... I once called this place home.
attributes.name: Agitated Cultist

attributes.content: You are still bound by such distractions?
attributes.name: Vigilant Cultist

attributes.content: No... no more. Burn them all.
attributes.name: Agitated Cultist

attributes.content: The Inquisition must not find them.
attributes.name: Vigilant Cultist

attributes.content: We embrace this knowledge, and promote harmony through enlightenment. The Inquisition, in their ignorance and selfishness, calls it heresy.
attributes.name: Vigilant Cultist

attributes.content: Let's go. We will find a way to reestablish contact.
attributes.name: Agitated Cultist

attributes.content: We too will embrace the ocean, someday.
attributes.name: Agitated Cultist

attributes.content: (Are they gone? Is this one of their hideouts? And here I thought it was just a struggling restaurant. It's only two blocks from the chapel, for crying out loud.)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (They're burning their papers? I have to put the fire out!)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (The flames are too strong. I have to save what I can—)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Yowch, that's hot!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Whew... are these blueprints? Some sort of equipment...? The stamp of approval has been burned to ash.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Historical records of Iberia... theses on ocean currents...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: What are they planning? Breo... gan? Royal shipwright?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: And what's this? A drawing of that statue in the square?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Put that down, Liberi. Let it burn as it should.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Elysium has always been confident in his ability to talk his way out of a situation.
In this case, however, he does not get a chance to, barely avoiding the touch of cold steel.
Hey, don't you know it's rude to strike without warning?!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit! Their goal is—
attributes.name: Elysium
